body: A question that has been bugging me ever since I got into fapping to Doujins...Who the fuck is full censoring these works? You can plainly see that the censorship used in this version is black bars. I'm okay with that. But then I see other versions of the same chapters (separated) with full censorship (whiteout genitals). So the original is black bars...then that means someone else added full censorship. Who is doing this? Why are they doing this? Why not just keep the original censorship the creator of the work used?
when is this going to get translated..
I like the two extra pages for Country Virgin Fiancee
